The Mediation Portal

The Mediation Portal developed by SINTEF ICT is a set of web services that help rapidly prototyping complex mediation algorithms between data models. Data mismatches are recurrent obstacles to system interoperability and always require human intervention to develop ad hoc solutions, or to finely tune existing mediation algorithms in the most favourable cases. In this setting, the Mediation Portal will help you define your mediation algorithm using a specific Domain Specific Language (DSL) especially designed to foster the development of mediation algorithms.

The services available are:

  • The model repository, which stores models

  • The mapping repository, which stores mapping

  • The mediator service, which calculates mapping between the data model

  • The comparator service, which compares a given mapping against another one

  • The comparison repository, which stores mappings comparisons
